meta_info: ::id bolt-eng-DF-170-181105-8850361_0028.25 ::date 2015-12-08T10:16:51 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred # ::snt The premium credit amount would be tied to the second lowest-cost silver plan in the area where the individual resides. # ::save-date Sun Oct 22, 2017 ::file bolt-eng-DF-170-181105-8850361_0028_25.txt
sentence: The premium credit amount would be tied to the second lowest-cost silver plan in the area where the individual resides.

meta_info: ::id bolt-eng-DF-170-181105-8850361_0028.26 ::date 2015-12-08T10:20:01 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred # ::snt This is approach (2) (and it becomes clear its the extreme when you study the details). # ::save-date Mon Dec 14, 2015 ::file bolt-eng-DF-170-181105-8850361_0028_26.txt
sentence: This is approach (2) (and it becomes clear its the extreme when you study the details).

meta_info: ::id bolt-eng-DF-170-181105-8850361_0028.27 ::date 2015-12-08T10:23:17 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred # ::snt If you live in an area with relatively inexpensive health plans, low- and moderate-income people in your area will receive smaller government subsidies than their similarly-situated identical twins who live in relatively high-cost areas. # ::save-date Sun Oct 22, 2017 ::file bolt-eng-DF-170-181105-8850361_0028_27.txt
sentence: If you live in an area with relatively inexpensive health plans, low- and moderate-income people in your area will receive smaller government subsidies than their similarly-situated identical twins who live in relatively high-cost areas.

meta_info: ::id bolt-eng-DF-170-181105-8850361_0028.28 ::date 2015-12-08T10:52:00 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred # ::snt A health plan is not a commodity like a gallon of milk. A health plan in Las Vegas is quite different from one in Portland. # ::save-date Mon Dec 14, 2015 ::file bolt-eng-DF-170-181105-8850361_0028_28.txt
sentence: A health plan is not a commodity like a gallon of milk. A health plan in Las Vegas is quite different from one in Portland.

meta_info: ::id bolt-eng-DF-170-181105-8850361_0028.29 ::date 2015-12-08T10:56:00 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred # ::snt While the overall cost-of-living in Portland is higher, health care spending is much higher in Las Vegas. # ::save-date Sun Oct 22, 2017 ::file bolt-eng-DF-170-181105-8850361_0028_29.txt
sentence: While the overall cost-of-living in Portland is higher, health care spending is much higher in Las Vegas.

meta_info: ::id bolt-eng-DF-170-181105-8850361_0028.30 ::date 2015-12-08T11:00:11 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred # ::snt This higher health spending is a function of different prices and different usage of medical care. # ::save-date Sun Oct 22, 2017 ::file bolt-eng-DF-170-181105-8850361_0028_30.txt
sentence: This higher health spending is a function of different prices and different usage of medical care.

meta_info: ::id bolt-eng-DF-170-181105-8850361_0028.31 ::date 2015-12-08T11:03:29 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred # ::snt Atul Gawande wrote a much-discussed article on this topic in The New Yorker, The Cost Conundrum: What a Texas town can teach us about health care. There are wide geographic dispersions in medical care spending, and it cannot all be explained by different prices. # ::save-date Mon Feb 15, 2016 ::file bolt-eng-DF-170-181105-8850361_0028_31.txt
sentence: Atul Gawande wrote a much-discussed article on this topic in The New Yorker, The Cost Conundrum: What a Texas town can teach us about health care. There are wide geographic dispersions in medical care spending, and it cannot all be explained by different prices.

meta_info: ::id bolt-eng-DF-170-181105-8850361_0028.32 ::date 2015-12-08T11:29:34 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred # ::snt While I disagree with Gawandes policy conclusions, I recommend the article.... # ::save-date Fri Jan 29, 2016 ::file bolt-eng-DF-170-181105-8850361_0028_32.txt
sentence: While I disagree with Gawandes policy conclusions, I recommend the article....
